channel.title: Massoud Afrashteh
channel.description: Sharing Software Development Tips and Experiences, by Massoud Afrashteh

item.title: Containers not in depth!
item.description: We always have been using abstraction to make things more robust, reusable, and readable. Nowadays geeks use it as a term called “Container” to have a simple and fast deployment.

item.title: When should not use Google/StackOverflow?
item.description: In the real world if you ask a question from an ordinary person of the 21 century and if that person did not know about answer then he/she will immediately ask your question from you again and will not think any more about (easy peasy)!!! This is the worse reaction when a person doesn’t use the mind in problem-solving.

item.title: Spring Boot, Apache CXF, Swagger under JAX-RS
item.description: This tutorial is about: Making a standard and enterprise JAX-RS Web Service with Spring Boot, Apache CXF, MySQL, and Swagger UI.
